questions.1: What is the most interesting thing you have learned recently? (about yourself or in general)
questions.2: What is something that makes you feel small?
questions.3: Remembering yourself as a child: What were your favorite things? What made you feel excited?
questions.4: What was happening in the world at the time of your birth, and how do you think it shaped who you are today?
questions.5: What do you fear most at the moment?
questions.7: Who is a person you admire? Why?
questions.9: What challenges are you facing right now?
questions.10: How do you deal with conflicts when you are at your worst?
questions.11: How do you like to be loved?
questions.12: What was your last moment of pure joy?
questions.13: Is there something you need to forgive someone for? Or forgive yourself for?
questions.14: In our current times, what gives you hope?
questions.15: Given the choice of anyone in the world, who would you want as a dinner guest? Why?
questions.16: If someone covered your basic cost of living, what would you do with your life?
questions.17: What is something you are grateful for at the moment?
questions.18: What skills or qualities do you see in other people that you envy?
questions.19: Is there something that you’ve dreamed of doing for a long time? If so, why haven’t you done it yet?
questions.20: Who are two people that shaped your life and how did they do so?
questions.21: If you knew that in one year you would die suddenly, what would you change about the way you are living now? Why?
questions.22: What was the last thing you cried about?
questions.23: Where or with whom do you feel at "home" (besides from your current address)? Why?
questions.24: What's a recurring conflict in your life?
questions.25: What is your relationship with religion?
questions.26: What was a moment that made you feel embarrassed?
questions.27: What do you sometimes pretend to be?
questions.28: What is something that made you feel proud?
questions.29: You are lost in a jungle with a trombone, a sheet of aluminum, a pack of chewing gum and a set of keys. How do you save the world?
questions.30: What do you do to forget about life for a while?
questions.31: If anything was possible, which problem in the world would you solve? Why?
questions.32: What is some feedback you've gotten more than once? And what did you do about it?
questions.33: What do you do for your personal well-being in your daily life?
questions.34: What is a crazy dream that you remember?
questions.35: What are your two favorite dance moves? Show them!
questions.36: What did you work the hardest for in life? Why?
questions.37: How did the way money was dealt with in your family shape you?
questions.38: How is your well-being at the moment?
questions.39: What is your best memory of great teamwork?
questions.40: What is one dream you have for your future?
questions.41: What's one of your earliest memories?
questions.43: Is there something you are addicted to? What feels right about it?
questions.44: What is your relationship with your work?
questions.46: What’s the best advice you’ve been given? Who gave it to you?
questions.47: What were some moments in your life when you felt the most afraid?
questions.48: How do you feel about death?
questions.49: What is a topic that is difficult for you to talk about at the moment?
questions.50: What is a trait you inherited from one of your parents/caregivers that you really like or dislike?
questions.51: How is nature part of your life?
questions.52: Are you in a healthy relationship with technology? Why?
questions.53: What life experience or decision made the biggest impact on your life?
questions.54: What is one of the most difficult things you’ve ever gone through?
questions.55: What is something you love about yourself?
questions.56: How were you as a teenager?
questions.57: What would you like to let go of?
questions.58: What was your first love story?
questions.59: Who in your friend or family circle would you like to know better? Why?
questions.60: What's your relationship with your body? How has it changed over time?
questions.61: Do you ever feel socially awkward? When and with whom?
questions.62: Do you have a heartbreak story? What is it?
questions.63: People are often very surprised when they discover ….. about me. Why do you think so?
questions.64: When did you think "oh no, not again", last? Why?
questions.65: What is the story you think others have about you?
questions.66: When were/are you happiest or most content in your life?
